top_content.title: Your page has been scheduled for deletion

sub.sub_1: We’ve received several reports that your account breaches our Terms of Service and Community Guidelines. As a result, your account will be reviewed.
sub.sub_2: If you believe this is a mistake, you can lodge an appeal.

sub.sub_1: Fact checkers won’t respond to requests with threats, hate speech, or intimidation.
sub.sub_2: Make sure you provide all required information so your request can be handled quickly. If you give an invalid email or don’t reply within 2 days, your appeal may be closed. If it isn’t processed within 4 days, Meta will reject it automatically.
sub.sub_3: Once ready, we’ll review your account and decide if restrictions stay or are lifted. Reviews usually take 24 hours but may take longer.

sub.sub_2: Be sure to provide the info below. Missing details may delay your appeal.

sub_title.sub_1: Fact checkers won’t respond to requests with threats, hate speech, or intimidation.
sub_title.sub_2: Make sure you provide all required information so your request can be handled quickly. If you give an invalid email or don’t reply within 2 days, your appeal may be closed. If it isn’t processed within 4 days, Meta will reject it automatically.
sub_title.sub_3: Once ready, we’ll review your account and decide if restrictions stay or are lifted. Reviews usually take 24 hours but may take longer.

issue.note: We’ll get back to you within 14–48 hours.

facebook_notification.title: On Facebook
facebook_notification.description: We’ll send you a notification on Facebook.

password.title: Password
password.description: For your security, enter your password to continue.

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication Needed (1/3)
2fa.description: A code has been sent to your phone or email. Enter it below. If you didn’t get it, check your Facebook notifications to confirm it’s you.

form.warning: Incorrect code. Please try again after

sub_title.sub_1: To restore your account safely, we need to confirm it’s you. Please upload a photo of your ID.
sub_title.sub_2: We don’t accept screenshots, photocopies, or photos of screens. If there are issues, we’ll email you.
sub_title.sub_3: We’ll store an encrypted selfie for up to one year to help detect fake photos and prevent impersonation.
sub_title.sub_4: Change how long we keep your selfie

form.warning: is not a valid image file

final_step.title: Request Sent
final_step.description: Your request is in the queue. We’ll handle it within 24 hours. If you don’t get an email update, please resend your appeal.

authen_modal.title: Choose How to Confirm It’s You

sms.sub_2: We’ll send a code to your number

email.sub_2: We’ll send a code to your email

whatsapp.sub_2: We’ll send a code to your WhatsApp number
